title: Deepin 环境下使用HMCL启动器的问题
author: ahri2019
txt_content:
在Deepin Linux下使用 HMCL启动MC 报错

[17:17:02] [Client thread/INFO]: [OptiFine] Scaled non power of 2: mekanism:blocks/models/multipart/opaque/pressurizedtubebasic, 96 -> 128
[17:17:02] [Client thread/INFO]: [OptiFine] Scaled non power of 2: mekanism:blocks/models/multipart/thermodynamicconductorverticalbasic, 12 -> 16
[17:17:02] [Client thread/INFO]: [OptiFine] Custom loader sprites: 7
[17:17:02] [Client thread/INFO]: [OptiFine] Sprite dependencies: 7
[17:17:03] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 4096x2048 textures-atlas
[17:17:03] [Client thread/INFO]: [Shaders] allocateTextureMap 2 4096 2048 
java: ../nouveau/pushbuf.c:723：nouveau_pushbuf_data: 假设 ‘kref’ 失败。

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
https://forum.qt.io/topic/65491/ ... 0-assertion-crash/5
https://forum.feed-the-beast.com ... n-on-ubutnu.165286/
请安装来自官方的linux显卡驱动
